Yes, play Portal 1 first because Portal 2 is full of references on every step of the way, and many jokes too. Love the humor!!! It's a direct continuation, and a strong one. Master of surprises. While Portal 1 took me around 3-4 hours, Portal 2 lasted 10-12 hours; the story mode, that is. After the main story, there's plenty of challenges, co-op maps, and the ability to build your own puzzles! So I'll get into those now. The lore got deep and thrilling, and somewhere in the middle it felt like Fallout 4. As a standalone story the Portal franchise is satisfying without tying it to the Half-Life games. It runs nicely on a regular laptop while being visually massive.

Amazing game, just to list some of the things it did right: Gameplay, one of the most fun games you can get today. Graphics, this was released in 2014, but looks like it is brand new, and it doesn't even need a bulky PC, Story, outstanding. comedy, also outstanding, amazing jokes and bits. Music, pretty good. Personally I think this should be the game of the decade. The perfect sequel, complete with co-op.

Portal 2 has been my dream game for over 5 years now, it’s humour is excellent, the way the game feels in excellent. The story it tells is breath-taking, even after the 3rd or 4th playthrough. It has so much replay ability, 10/10 game for me. It truly takes the cake for me.

Outro jogo maravilhoso que eu só tive a oportunidade de jogar recentemente e não me arrependo nem um pouquinho de ter comprado, principalmente por ter pago só 4 golpezinhos na Steam, o que é um preço muito bom pra um jogo tão rico em história, jogabilidade e nostalgia como o Portal 2! Recomendo pra qualquer um, sem dúvidas.

Очень интересная игра, при должном понимании может даже затянуть на несколько десятков часов. Сюжет довольно не однообразный, решая головоломки , ты не видишь как быстро пролетает время. Иногда придётся даже изрядно попотеть над решением головоломки. Высокую оценку этой игры считаю вполне заслуженной. 10/10
